title: The Magus Cypher Bundle
description: Most Magi believed the Puzzle of Perplex to be a mere curiosity. Yet generations of wizards had broken themselves trying to solve it.

title: Feast of Abscession Bundle
description: Centuries ago, the Rumusque priestess Crella forged unbreakable links of hook and chain to bind the most powerful servants.

title: Frostivus 2018 Treasure 2
description: Each time you open this treasure you will receive one of the treasure.You will not receive duplicates.

title: Great Sage's Reckoning Bundle
description: Though his misdeeds have long been forgiven, the thrills of Sun Wukong's crimes live on.Relive three legendary trials.

title: Treasure of the Glacial Abyss
description: Each time you open this treasure you will receive one of the treasure.You will not receive duplicates.

title: Warding Guise
description: Warding Guise is a custom ward. It changes the appearance of Observer Wards and Sentry Wards.

title: Spear of the Reckless Vigor
description: This set was made for Frostivus 2018. Sadly, even huskar fell to the mighty power of winter holydays.

title: Tempest Helm of the Thundergod Bundle
description: Forged by the Hammers of Celestarr, this mighty helm feels at home resting across the brow of the Lord of Heaven himself.

title: Treasure of the Rotted Gallows
description: This treasure contains full item sets. The items in this treasure will not be tradable or marketable.

title: Chains of the Black Death
description: This set comes with multiple styles, as well as custom ability icons and particle effects. It was created as a collaboration with DotaCinema.

title: Manifold Paradox Blades
description: With a raspy cackle, the elder smith Craler swung the sword that his family had spent eleven generations to fold and forge.
